NotRecruited_CFM.synopsis: Wyll appears at camp to confront Karlach, if she was recruited first or is avatar and met Wyll.

IVB_CFM.synopsis: Karlach and Wyll meet at the camp and start a discussion. If not defused by the player it could escalate to Wyll or Karlach permanently leaving the party hostile.
IVB_CFM.how_to_trigger: Start a game as any character but Wyll or Karlach, recruit them using the debug book and go to camp.

NotRecruited_CFM_72.context: CinematicNodeContext: The party enters camp, and Wyll walks out of the shadows or otherwise appears in a surprising way. He holds his starting blade in his hand.

NotRecruited_CFM_295.speaker: Narrator
NotRecruited_CFM_295.text: *You have a flash of recognition. This is the Blade of Frontiers - hero of the Sword Coast, and the hunter who chased you through the Hells.*

NotRecruited_CFM_327.speaker: Karlach
NotRecruited_CFM_327.text: I figured you'd show up. The Blade of Frontiers is a man of his word.

NotRecruited_CFM_59.speaker: Wyll
NotRecruited_CFM_59.text: Then I live up to my repute. And you -

NotRecruited_CFM_345.speaker: Karlach
NotRecruited_CFM_345.text: Ah, the legend lives. I figured you'd show up eventually.

NotRecruited_CFM_347.speaker: Karlach
NotRecruited_CFM_347.text: Give it up already, I'm not the monster you think I am.

NotRecruited_CFM_122.speaker: Wyll
NotRecruited_CFM_122.text: I know exactly what you are. Zariel's -

NotRecruited_CFM_45.speaker: Karlach
NotRecruited_CFM_45.text: It's about time. Shall I put the kettle on?

NotRecruited_CFM_31.speaker: Wyll
NotRecruited_CFM_31.text: The devil's way, isn't it? So casually cruel. I -

NotRecruited_CFM_165.speaker: Narrator
NotRecruited_CFM_165.text: *A great fire roars through you - the fire of the Hells you've escaped.*
NotRecruited_CFM_165.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hands to temples, mindmeld is happening

NotRecruited_CFM_151.speaker: Narrator
NotRecruited_CFM_151.text: *You are the Blade of Frontiers, racing through the wastes of Avernus. Just ahead, a familiar figure - red skin, single curled horn - blazes with flame, bloodied greataxe held high.*
NotRecruited_CFM_151.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hands to temples, mindmeld is happening

NotRecruited_CFM_263.speaker: Narrator
NotRecruited_CFM_263.text: *He chases you across the Hells' battlefields, ignited with rancour. He sees you as an infernal wardevil, a threat to the living - evil incarnate.*
NotRecruited_CFM_263.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hands to temples, mindmeld is happening

NotRecruited_CFM_142.speaker: Wyll
NotRecruited_CFM_142.text: Infernal soldier, Zariel's lickspittle. I will not let you burn the Sword Coast to ash.

NotRecruited_CFM_229.speaker: Karlach
NotRecruited_CFM_229.text: I'm not going to hurt anyone, and I'm certainly no devil.

NotRecruited_CFM_258.speaker: Wyll
NotRecruited_CFM_258.context: CinematicNodeContext: Interrupted by a vision, grips head in mindmeld.

NotRecruited_CFM_190.speaker: Karlach
NotRecruited_CFM_190.text: For shit's sake, you really don't know how Zariel 'recruits' her soldiers, do you?

NotRecruited_CFM_178.speaker: Wyll
NotRecruited_CFM_178.context: CinematicNodeContext: Interrupted by a vision, grips head in mindmeld.

NotRecruited_CFM_262.speaker: Narrator
NotRecruited_CFM_262.text: *He sees through your eyes. You slice through one devil after another - Zariel's servants - as your eyes dart around, seeking escape.*

NotRecruited_CFM_137.speaker: Narrator
NotRecruited_CFM_137.text: *The man shudders with your desperation, and sees the naked truth: you are a victim of the Blood War, not an agent of it.*

NotRecruited_CFM_101.speaker: Wyll
NotRecruited_CFM_101.text: By Balduran's helm, I - no. I will not be tricked!

NotRecruited_CFM_177.speaker: Karlach
NotRecruited_CFM_177.text: You saw the truth. I'm not a danger to the Coast.

NotRecruited_CFM_93.speaker: Karlach
NotRecruited_CFM_93.text: Be practical. You're infected, same as me. You need allies, not enemies.

NotRecruited_CFM_302.speaker: Narrator
NotRecruited_CFM_302.text: *He catches his breath, and his lips straighten. Sheer dread twists his face.*
NotRecruited_CFM_302.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll catches his breath, and his face hardens. Signs of worry, fear - even sheer dread.

NotRecruited_CFM_32.speaker: Karlach
NotRecruited_CFM_32.text: Thank the gods. I thought I was going to have to take your head.

NotRecruited_CFM_187.speaker: Wyll
NotRecruited_CFM_187.text: I can only hope you won't have to find out.
NotRecruited_CFM_187.context: NodeContext: Referring to mizora. With portent

NotRecruited_CFM_186.speaker: Gale
NotRecruited_CFM_186.text: Stormy introduction aside, might I suggest a partnership instead? The Blade of Frontiers would make a formidable ally.

NotRecruited_CFM_155.speaker: Karlach
NotRecruited_CFM_155.text: Great idea. You could join up with us - find a cure for these parasites, smash some skulls.

NotRecruited_CFM_135.speaker: Karlach
NotRecruited_CFM_135.text: How about 'teammates'? Find a cure for these parasites, smash some skulls together.

NotRecruited_CFM_297.speaker: Wyll
NotRecruited_CFM_297.text: I'm up for the challenge. You've just got to make a little space.

NotRecruited_CFM_119.speaker: Karlach
NotRecruited_CFM_119.text: Right you are. You should remain here, for the time being.

NotRecruited_CFM_134.speaker: Wyll
NotRecruited_CFM_134.text: I've not grown any tentacles yet, thank Balduran - but luck won't be on our side forever.

NotRecruited_CFM_6.speaker: Wyll
NotRecruited_CFM_6.text: You seem like a good crew.

NotRecruited_CFM_38.speaker: Wyll
NotRecruited_CFM_38.text: Yes, you have my blade - not to mention, a thousand sorries.

NotRecruited_CFM_259.speaker: Karlach
NotRecruited_CFM_259.text: You can take Astarion's place - he'll stay here at camp.

NotRecruited_CFM_43.speaker: Narrator
NotRecruited_CFM_43.text: *Your companion is otherwise engaged. You'll need to dismiss them at a more convenient moment.*

NotRecruited_CFM_329.speaker: Karlach
NotRecruited_CFM_329.text: Gale could do with a rest.

NotRecruited_CFM_66.speaker: Karlach
NotRecruited_CFM_66.text: Truce. But I think it's best if you get on your way.

NotRecruited_CFM_41.speaker: Wyll
NotRecruited_CFM_41.text: I see the good in you, Karlach. I promise not to lose sight of it, even when the Hells burn hottest.

NotRecruited_CFM_319.speaker: Karlach
NotRecruited_CFM_319.text: Get out. And don't show your face again.

NotRecruited_CFM_296.speaker: Karlach
NotRecruited_CFM_296.text: Ding ding ding. You got there in the end.

NotRecruited_CFM_211.speaker: Wyll
NotRecruited_CFM_211.text: I had my reasons to hope I was right. But I can't deny the truth.
NotRecruited_CFM_211.context: NodeContext: Referring to mizora. With portent

NotRecruited_CFM_339.speaker: Karlach
NotRecruited_CFM_339.text: You're a problem. And I'm thinking violence is the solution.

NotRecruited_CFM_251.speaker: Wyll
NotRecruited_CFM_251.text: To the Hells with you devil - and may you forever burn.

NotRecruited_CFM_285.speaker: Karlach
NotRecruited_CFM_285.text: Yes, I served Zariel. But I had no bloody choice.

NotRecruited_CFM_341.speaker: Wyll
NotRecruited_CFM_341.text: And yet you served. I - ngh!
NotRecruited_CFM_341.context: CinematicNodeContext: Interrupted by a vision, grips head in mindmeld.

NotRecruited_CFM_307.speaker: Karlach
NotRecruited_CFM_307.text: You want a fight? Let's see what the Blade can do.

NotRecruited_CFM_338.speaker: Karlach
NotRecruited_CFM_338.text: You better lower that blade if you know what's good for you.

NotRecruited_CFM_108.speaker: Wyll
NotRecruited_CFM_108.text: My blade's found its prey. Zariel's chosen -

NotRecruited_CFM_244.context: CinematicNodeContext: The party enters camp, and Wyll walks out of the shadows or otherwise appears in a surprising way. He holds his starting blade in his hand.

NotRecruited_CFM_156.speaker: Karlach
NotRecruited_CFM_156.text: The Blade of Frontiers. Thought I'd shaken you for good after the mind flayer ship. But you just can't get enough of me, can you.
NotRecruited_CFM_156.context: NodeContext: With an edge - she's not flirting. Talking to a guy who's been pursuing her in the name of her evil mistress.

NotRecruited_CFM_56.speaker: Wyll
NotRecruited_CFM_56.text: One horn. The stink of Avernus. Advocatus diaboli.

NotRecruited_CFM_210.speaker: Karlach
NotRecruited_CFM_210.context: NodeContext: Eye-roll. Wyll calling her a devil. She's annoyed but has her charm behind it.

NotRecruited_CFM_173.speaker: Wyll
NotRecruited_CFM_173.text: Karlach. The archdevil Zariel's gladiator, come to burn the Sword Coast to ash.

NotRecruited_CFM_282.speaker: Player
NotRecruited_CFM_282.text: I thought you were waiting at the grove. What are you doing here?

NotRecruited_CFM_261.speaker: Wyll
NotRecruited_CFM_261.text: The parasite links us - it showed me you with the fiend. Her death is my first priority, as it has always been.

NotRecruited_CFM_201.speaker: Wyll
NotRecruited_CFM_201.text: Stand back. The first strike is mine.

NotRecruited_CFM_26.speaker: Player
NotRecruited_CFM_26.text: You've got it all wrong, Wyll. Karlach's not about to hurt anyone.

NotRecruited_CFM_350.speaker: Karlach
NotRecruited_CFM_350.text: Well - not counting the fuckers that need a good hurting.

NotRecruited_CFM_322.speaker: Player
NotRecruited_CFM_322.text: The two of you have met before, I see.

NotRecruited_CFM_100.speaker: Karlach
NotRecruited_CFM_100.text: If by 'met' you mean hoofing it through the Hells with this fucker on my tail.

NotRecruited_CFM_98.speaker: Wyll
NotRecruited_CFM_98.text: Shut it, devil - I know your kind. A heart darker than a shadow's nightmares. You'd cut a child's throat just to taste the blood.

NotRecruited_CFM_167.speaker: Karlach
NotRecruited_CFM_167.text: A devil? I didn't take the Blade for a fool. I'm - ngh!

NotRecruited_CFM_75.speaker: Narrator
NotRecruited_CFM_75.text: *A great fire roars through you - the fire of the First Hell.*
NotRecruited_CFM_75.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hands to temples, mindmeld is happening

NotRecruited_CFM_351.speaker: Narrator
NotRecruited_CFM_351.text: *You are Karlach, tearing through demons across a blood-red landscape of fire and volcanic cinder.*
NotRecruited_CFM_351.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hands to temples, mindmeld is happening

NotRecruited_CFM_222.speaker: Narrator
NotRecruited_CFM_222.text: *The front lines of the Blood War. With every swing of her axe, Karlach fulfils mistress Zariel's purpose.*
NotRecruited_CFM_222.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hands to temples, mindmeld is happening

NotRecruited_CFM_300.speaker: Wyll
NotRecruited_CFM_300.text: Proof, clear as summer sky. It's over, Karlach. It's time you feel the sting of the Blade.

NotRecruited_CFM_311.speaker: Narrator
NotRecruited_CFM_311.text: *Wyll shudders with Karlach's desperation. She is a victim of the Blood War, not an agent of it.*
NotRecruited_CFM_311.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hands to temples, mindmeld is happening

NotRecruited_CFM_198.speaker: Player
NotRecruited_CFM_198.text: I captured your target, Wyll. Why don't you do the honours?

NotRecruited_CFM_44.speaker: Wyll
NotRecruited_CFM_44.text: Karlach. Advocatus diaboli. The stink of Avernus.

NotRecruited_CFM_175.speaker: Player
NotRecruited_CFM_175.text: I remember you, from the goblin fight at the grove. What do you want?

NotRecruited_CFM_310.speaker: Wyll
NotRecruited_CFM_310.text: The devil's head. And yours, if you so much as -

NotRecruited_CFM_267.speaker: Player
NotRecruited_CFM_267.text: You better lower that blade if you know what's good for you.

NotRecruited_CFM_107.speaker: Wyll
NotRecruited_CFM_107.text: You ally with an archdevil's chosen, and -

NotRecruited_CFM_182.speaker: Narrator
NotRecruited_CFM_182.text: *A great fire roars through you - the fire of the First Hell.*
NotRecruited_CFM_182.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hands to temples, mindmeld is happening

NotRecruited_CFM_169.speaker: Narrator
NotRecruited_CFM_169.text: *You are the Blade of Frontiers, racing through the wastes of Avernus. Just ahead, a diabolical figure - red skin, single curled horn - blazes with flame, bloodied greataxe held high.*
NotRecruited_CFM_169.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hands to temples, mindmeld is happening

NotRecruited_CFM_160.speaker: Narrator
NotRecruited_CFM_160.text: *He chases the fiend, ignited with rancour. She is an infernal wardevil, a threat to the living - evil incarnate.*
NotRecruited_CFM_160.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hands to temples, mindmeld is happening

NotRecruited_CFM_58.speaker: Narrator
NotRecruited_CFM_58.text: *You are Karlach, tearing through demons across a blood-red landscape of fire and volcanic cinder.*
NotRecruited_CFM_58.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hands to temples, mindmeld is happening

NotRecruited_CFM_143.speaker: Narrator
NotRecruited_CFM_143.text: *The front lines of the Blood War. With every swing of her axe, Karlach fulfils mistress Zariel's purpose.*
NotRecruited_CFM_143.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hands to temples, mindmeld is happening

NotRecruited_CFM_314.speaker: Wyll
NotRecruited_CFM_314.text: Your ally's a fraud - a soldier in the archdevil Zariel's army. Either I cut her down, or she burns the Sword Coast to ash.

NotRecruited_CFM_74.speaker: Karlach
NotRecruited_CFM_74.text: I've tried to tell you - I'm not what you think I am. I'm - ngh!

NotRecruited_CFM_245.speaker: Narrator
NotRecruited_CFM_245.text: *Another vision. Karlach's blade raised, slicing through devils - Zariel's servants - as her eyes dart around, seeking escape.*
NotRecruited_CFM_245.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hands to temples, mindmeld is happening

NotRecruited_CFM_85.speaker: Narrator
NotRecruited_CFM_85.text: *The man shudders with Karlach's desperation. She is a victim of the Blood War, not an agent of it.*
NotRecruited_CFM_85.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hands to temples, mindmeld is happening

NotRecruited_CFM_80.speaker: Wyll
NotRecruited_CFM_80.text: By Balduran's helm, I - no. I will not be tricked!
NotRecruited_CFM_80.context: NodeContext: Questioning himself. He has learned the 'monster' he hunts is a victim, but he still ready to attack

NotRecruited_CFM_287.speaker: Karlach
NotRecruited_CFM_287.text: You saw the truth. I may be an effective soldier, but I never wanted to serve Zariel. Legged it away from her the first chance I got.

NotRecruited_CFM_112.speaker: Player
NotRecruited_CFM_112.text: Stand down. You saw what I saw - Karlach is not a danger.

NotRecruited_CFM_82.speaker: Narrator
NotRecruited_CFM_82.text: *The man catches his breath, and his lips straighten. Sheer dread twists his face.*
NotRecruited_CFM_82.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll catches his breath, and his face hardens. Signs of worry, fear - even sheer dread.

NotRecruited_CFM_180.speaker: Wyll
NotRecruited_CFM_180.text: No. Devils can not be trusted!

NotRecruited_CFM_215.speaker: Player
NotRecruited_CFM_215.text: Gods, you're stubborn. Karlach's not a devil, and you know it.

NotRecruited_CFM_278.speaker: Player
NotRecruited_CFM_278.text: You saw Karlach's thoughts. She poses no threat to the Sword Coast.

NotRecruited_CFM_274.speaker: Player
NotRecruited_CFM_274.text: You're right. Let's cut her down before she causes any trouble.

NotRecruited_CFM_117.speaker: Wyll
NotRecruited_CFM_117.text: It's done, Karlach. By my living soul, you will forever burn.

NotRecruited_CFM_54.speaker: Karlach
NotRecruited_CFM_54.text: You know, I could've used a few friends. Pity that won't be any of you.

NotRecruited_CFM_23.speaker: Player
NotRecruited_CFM_23.text: You invade my camp and threaten my friend? You're the one dying tonight.

NotRecruited_CFM_330.speaker: Karlach
NotRecruited_CFM_330.text: How about we all take a nice deep breath and calm the fuck down. Just cause I want to live doesn't mean I want him dead.

NotRecruited_CFM_105.speaker: Player
NotRecruited_CFM_105.text: Fine, but he needs to stand down. We saw the truth for ourselves.

NotRecruited_CFM_147.speaker: Karlach
NotRecruited_CFM_147.text: Would you listen to sense? This doesn't have to end badly - for either of us.

NotRecruited_CFM_271.speaker: Karlach
NotRecruited_CFM_271.text: You know monsters, right? Better than anyone. Look into my eyes. Can't you see I'm not what you think?

NotRecruited_CFM_123.speaker: Wyll
NotRecruited_CFM_123.context: CinematicNodeContext: There's a pause, and then Wyll swears. He realises he has resigned himself to becoming a devil himself. He's upset - but he knows he did the right thing. He lowers his blade.

NotRecruited_CFM_7.speaker: Wyll
NotRecruited_CFM_7.text: You really are no devil, are you? I've... I've been deceived.

NotRecruited_CFM_194.speaker: Karlach
NotRecruited_CFM_194.text: Thank the gods. Thought I was going to have to take your head.
NotRecruited_CFM_194.context: NodeContext: Relieved Wyll is seeing sense. Calming down from her anger.

NotRecruited_CFM_0.speaker: Wyll
NotRecruited_CFM_0.text: You would've died in the attempt. But - there have been enough threats today.
NotRecruited_CFM_0.context: NodeContext: Small flare of anger again, but ultimately Wyll is calming down and realizing Karlach is an ally.

NotRecruited_CFM_191.speaker: Wyll
NotRecruited_CFM_191.text: I see the good in you, Karlach. I promise not to lose sight of it, even when the Hells burn hottest.

NotRecruited_CFM_195.speaker: Wyll
NotRecruited_CFM_195.text: I'm returning to the grove. Zevlor's people need champions.

NotRecruited_CFM_78.speaker: Wyll
NotRecruited_CFM_78.text: I hope he can count you in that number.

NotRecruited_CFM_121.speaker: Karlach
NotRecruited_CFM_121.text: I'll do you one better: allies.

NotRecruited_CFM_37.speaker: Karlach
NotRecruited_CFM_37.text: We're looking to get rid of these parasites for good - and ruin some bastards' days while we're at it. Sounds like your kind of venture.

NotRecruited_CFM_249.speaker: Wyll
NotRecruited_CFM_249.text: I've not grown any tentacles yet, thank Balduran - but luck won't be on our side forever.

NotRecruited_CFM_136.speaker: Wyll
NotRecruited_CFM_136.text: Yes, you have my blade - your leader willing, of course.

NotRecruited_CFM_25.speaker: Player
NotRecruited_CFM_25.text: The more the merrier, as they say.

NotRecruited_CFM_48.speaker: Wyll
NotRecruited_CFM_48.text: I'm up for the challenge. You've just got to make a little space.

NotRecruited_CFM_103.speaker: Player
NotRecruited_CFM_103.text: Right you are. You should remain here, for the time being.

NotRecruited_CFM_257.speaker: Player
NotRecruited_CFM_257.text: You can take Astarion's place - he'll stay here at camp.

NotRecruited_CFM_270.speaker: Narrator
NotRecruited_CFM_270.text: *Your companion is otherwise engaged. You'll need to dismiss them at a more convenient moment.*

NotRecruited_CFM_358.speaker: Player
NotRecruited_CFM_358.text: Gale could do with a rest.

NotRecruited_CFM_236.speaker: Karlach
NotRecruited_CFM_236.text: Pfft. Everyone on this team is nothing but trouble. But I'm sure we can all agree to keep it down to a simmer.

NotRecruited_CFM_254.speaker: Wyll
NotRecruited_CFM_254.text: Well met. And - a thousand sorries.

NotRecruited_CFM_57.speaker: Wyll
NotRecruited_CFM_57.text: I've pledged my life to protecting the meek from monsters - but tonight, I was the rampaging beast.

NotRecruited_CFM_51.speaker: Wyll
NotRecruited_CFM_51.text: I see the good in you, Karlach. I promise not to lose sight of it, even when the Hells burn hottest.

NotRecruited_CFM_223.speaker: Shadowheart
NotRecruited_CFM_223.text: Hmph - the famous Blade of Frontiers, in the flesh. Clever, this hero act you've got going.

NotRecruited_CFM_252.speaker: Wyll
NotRecruited_CFM_252.text: 'Hero,' 'Blade' - names strangers gave me. My friends call me 'Wyll'.

NotRecruited_CFM_131.speaker: Shadowheart
NotRecruited_CFM_131.text: Excellent. If we ever become friends, I'll know what to call you.

NotRecruited_CFM_303.speaker: Player
NotRecruited_CFM_303.text: All right. But you're both out of here at the first sign of trouble.

NotRecruited_CFM_332.speaker: Player
NotRecruited_CFM_332.text: I'll consider it. How do I know I can trust you?

NotRecruited_CFM_113.speaker: Wyll
NotRecruited_CFM_113.text: Let my deeds to come prove my worth.

NotRecruited_CFM_279.speaker: Player
NotRecruited_CFM_279.text: Not on your life. I want him out of here.

NotRecruited_CFM_95.speaker: Wyll
NotRecruited_CFM_95.text: Fair is fair. Tonight, I lost the right to be called 'hero'.

NotRecruited_CFM_344.speaker: Wyll
NotRecruited_CFM_344.text: I see the good in you, Karlach. I promise not to lose sight of it, even when the Hells burn hottest.

NotRecruited_CFM_315.speaker: Player
NotRecruited_CFM_315.text: But I do. The Blade of Frontiers will be only a memory come tomorrow.

NotRecruited_CFM_298.speaker: Wyll
NotRecruited_CFM_298.text: To the Hells with you, then - and may you all forever burn.

NotRecruited_CFM_352.speaker: Player
NotRecruited_CFM_352.text: Be practical. You're infected, same as us. You need allies, not enemies.

NotRecruited_CFM_269.speaker: Player
NotRecruited_CFM_269.text: I never did trust you, Karlach. You're as good as dead.

NotRecruited_CFM_154.speaker: Player
NotRecruited_CFM_154.text: The only one dying tonight's the Blade of Frontiers.

NotRecruited_CFM_230.speaker: Player
NotRecruited_CFM_230.text: Fine, but he needs to stand down. We saw the truth for ourselves.

NotRecruited_CFM_277.speaker: Player
NotRecruited_CFM_277.text: 'The Blade of Frontiers'. Did I hear that right?

NotRecruited_CFM_171.speaker: Player
NotRecruited_CFM_171.text: The Blade of Frontiers, hero of the Sword Coast. Have I got that right?

NotRecruited_CFM_140.speaker: Wyll
NotRecruited_CFM_140.text: Pride of the Coast, in the flesh. And you've got -

NotRecruited_CFM_179.speaker: Player
NotRecruited_CFM_179.text: The hero from the druid's grove. What do you want?

NotRecruited_CFM_170.speaker: Player
NotRecruited_CFM_170.text: You better lower that blade if you know what's good for you.

NotRecruited_CFM_16.speaker: Player
NotRecruited_CFM_16.text: You two know each other, I see.

NotRecruited_CFM_293.speaker: Karlach
NotRecruited_CFM_293.text: Like a hammer knows an untouchable nail. Look, I'm not -

IVB_CFM_68.context:
CinematicNodeContext: [opening, face-to-face]

Wyll and Karlach stand facing one another, fists clenched.

IVB_CFM_62.speaker: Wyll
IVB_CFM_62.text: One horn. The stink of Avernus. Advocatus diaboli.

IVB_CFM_8.speaker: Karlach
IVB_CFM_8.text: Well I'll be godsdamned - the Blade of Frontiers. Thought I'd shaken you for good. That'll teach me to underestimate you.

IVB_CFM_6.speaker: Wyll
IVB_CFM_6.text: Karlach. The archdevil Zariel's gladiator, come to burn the Sword Coast to ash.

IVB_CFM_27.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_27.text: You've got it all wrong, Wyll. Karlach's not about to hurt anyone.

IVB_CFM_17.speaker: Karlach
IVB_CFM_17.text: Well - not counting the fuckers that need a good hurting.

IVB_CFM_26.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_26.text: The two of you have met before, I see.

IVB_CFM_78.speaker: Karlach
IVB_CFM_78.text: If by 'met' you mean hoofing it through the Hells with this fucker on my tail.

IVB_CFM_11.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_11.text: I brought you your target, Wyll. Why don't you do the honours?

IVB_CFM_16.speaker: Wyll
IVB_CFM_16.text: Shut it, devil - I know your kind. A heart darker than a shadow's nightmares. You'd cut a child's throat just to taste the blood.

IVB_CFM_55.speaker: Karlach
IVB_CFM_55.text: A devil? I didn't take the Blade for a fool. I'm - ngh!

IVB_CFM_35.speaker: Narrator
IVB_CFM_35.text: *A great fire roars through you - the fire of the First Hell.*
IVB_CFM_35.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hands to temples, mindmeld is happening

IVB_CFM_70.speaker: Narrator
IVB_CFM_70.text: *You are Karlach, tearing through demons across a blood-red landscape of fire and volcanic cinder.*
IVB_CFM_70.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hands to temples, mindmeld is happening

IVB_CFM_108.speaker: Narrator
IVB_CFM_108.text: *The front lines of the Blood War. With every swing of her axe, Karlach fulfils mistress Zariel's purpose.*
IVB_CFM_108.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hands to temples, mindmeld is happening

IVB_CFM_7.speaker: Wyll
IVB_CFM_7.text: Proof, clear as summer sky. It's over, Karlach. It's time you feel the sting of the Blade.

IVB_CFM_2.speaker: Karlach
IVB_CFM_2.text: I've tried to tell you - I'm not what you think I am.

IVB_CFM_41.speaker: Narrator
IVB_CFM_41.text: *Another vision. Karlach's blade raised, slicing through devils - Zariel's servants - as her eyes dart around, seeking escape.*
IVB_CFM_41.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hands to temples, mindmeld is happening

IVB_CFM_74.speaker: Narrator
IVB_CFM_74.text: *Wyll shudders with Karlach's desperation. She is a victim of the Blood War, not an agent of it.*
IVB_CFM_74.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hands to temples, mindmeld is happening

IVB_CFM_91.speaker: Wyll
IVB_CFM_91.text: By Balduran's helm, I - no. I will not be tricked!
IVB_CFM_91.context: NodeContext: Questioning himself. He has learned the 'monster' he hunts is a victim, but he still ready to attack

IVB_CFM_64.speaker: Karlach
IVB_CFM_64.text: You saw the truth. I may be an effective soldier, but I never wanted to serve Zariel. Legged it away from her the first chance I got.

IVB_CFM_38.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_38.text: Stand down. You saw what I saw - Karlach is not a danger.

IVB_CFM_98.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_98.text: Be practical. She's infected, same as us. We need allies, not enemies.

IVB_CFM_96.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_96.text: I should never have trusted you, Karlach. You're as good as dead.

IVB_CFM_94.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_94.text: You want a fight Wyll? I'll give you one.

IVB_CFM_46.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_46.text: Fine, but he needs to stand down. We saw the truth for ourselves.

IVB_CFM_28.speaker: Narrator
IVB_CFM_28.text: *Wyll catches his breath, and his lips straighten. Sheer dread twists his face.*
IVB_CFM_28.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll catches his breath, and his face hardens. Signs of worry, fear - even sheer dread.

IVB_CFM_21.speaker: Wyll
IVB_CFM_21.text: No. Devils can not be trusted!

IVB_CFM_1.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_1.text: Gods, you're stubborn. Karlach's not a devil, and you know it.

IVB_CFM_73.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_73.text: You saw Karlach's thoughts. She poses no threat to the Sword Coast.

IVB_CFM_32.speaker: Karlach
IVB_CFM_32.text: You know monsters better than anyone. Can't you look in my eyes and see I'm not a devil?

IVB_CFM_12.speaker: Wyll
IVB_CFM_12.text: You don't know what this means. You don't know what you're asking me to do.
IVB_CFM_12.context: NodeContext: Fighting with himself. He doesn't want to believe it. Not killing Karlach means punishment from Mizora

IVB_CFM_4.speaker: Karlach
IVB_CFM_4.text: I'm asking you to live, Wyll. I don't want to hurt you. And, to be frank, I'd rather not find out how the Blade got his name.

IVB_CFM_53.speaker: Karlach
IVB_CFM_53.text: I swear to you, on all I am, I'm not what you think.

IVB_CFM_56.speaker: Wyll
IVB_CFM_56.context: CinematicNodeContext: There's a pause, and then Wyll swears. He realises he has resigned himself to becoming a devil himself. He's upset - but he knows he did the right thing. He relaxes into a neutral position.

IVB_CFM_83.speaker: Wyll
IVB_CFM_83.text: You really are no devil, are you? I've... I've been deceived.

IVB_CFM_20.speaker: Karlach
IVB_CFM_20.text: Thank the gods. Thought I was going to have to take your head.
IVB_CFM_20.context: NodeContext: Relieved Wyll is seeing sense. Calming down from her anger.

IVB_CFM_100.speaker: Wyll
IVB_CFM_100.text: You would've died in the attempt. But - there have been enough threats today.

IVB_CFM_3.speaker: Karlach
IVB_CFM_3.context: NodeContext: A little bit of uncertainty, hoping Wyll is calming down

IVB_CFM_48.speaker: Wyll
IVB_CFM_48.context: NodeContext: Resigned to his fate but knows he's making the right decision in not attacking Karlach.

IVB_CFM_67.speaker: Wyll
IVB_CFM_67.text: I see the good in you, Karlach. I promise not to lose sight of it, even when the Hells burn hottest.

IVB_CFM_107.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_107.text: You're right. Let's cut her down before she causes any trouble.

IVB_CFM_93.speaker: Wyll
IVB_CFM_93.text: It's done, Karlach. By my living soul, you will forever burn.

IVB_CFM_101.speaker: Karlach
IVB_CFM_101.text: You know, I could've used a few friends. Pity that won't be any of you.

IVB_CFM_60.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_60.text: It's you I don't trust, Wyll. You wanted a fight? You've got it.

IVB_CFM_51.speaker: Karlach
IVB_CFM_51.text: How about we all take a nice deep breath and calm the fuck down. Just cause I want to live doesn't mean I want him dead.

IVB_CFM_84.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_84.text: Fine, but he needs to stand down. We saw the truth for ourselves.

IVB_CFM_81.speaker: Karlach
IVB_CFM_81.text: Would you listen to sense? This doesn't have to end badly - for either of us.

IVB_CFM_15.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_15.text: But I do. The Blade of Frontiers will be only a memory come tomorrow.

IVB_CFM_31.speaker: Wyll
IVB_CFM_31.text: To the Hells with you, then - and may you all forever burn.

IVB_CFM_19.speaker: Karlach
IVB_CFM_19.text: Well I'll be godsdamned - the Blade of Frontiers. Thought I'd shaken you for good. That'll teach me to underestimate you.

IVB_CFM_99.speaker: Astarion
IVB_CFM_99.context: NodeContext: Realising Karlach and Wyll had met in the past (Wyll tried to kill Karlach)

IVB_CFM_33.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_33.text: I see you've met. Saves me the trouble of introductions.

IVB_CFM_43.speaker: Karlach
IVB_CFM_43.text: If by 'met' you mean hoofing it through the Hells with this fucker on my tail.

IVB_CFM_106.speaker: Karlach
IVB_CFM_106.text: Look - it's an honour to be chased by a famed hero. I'm no devil, though. Not by a long shot.

IVB_CFM_97.speaker: Wyll
IVB_CFM_97.text: My sources say otherwise. Not a devil? Prove it.

IVB_CFM_103.speaker: Karlach
IVB_CFM_103.text: How should I do that exactly? Carve out my soul to serve with a nice side of turnips?

IVB_CFM_36.speaker: Wyll
IVB_CFM_36.text: You fight in the Blood War for Zariel. You'll bring the Blood War to the Coast.

IVB_CFM_75.speaker: Karlach
IVB_CFM_75.text: Yeah, I stowed away on a mind flayer ship so I could bring the war home. Makes perfect sense.

IVB_CFM_57.speaker: Karlach
IVB_CFM_57.text: If you'd just hear me out -

IVB_CFM_58.speaker: Narrator
IVB_CFM_58.text: *A great fire roars through you - the fire of the First Hell.*
IVB_CFM_58.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hands to temples, mindmeld is happening

IVB_CFM_66.speaker: Narrator
IVB_CFM_66.text: *Her rage and desperation seep into you. She is a victim of the Blood War, not an agent of it.*
IVB_CFM_66.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hands to temples, mindmeld is happening

IVB_CFM_88.speaker: Karlach
IVB_CFM_88.text: Fuck. I'll never get used to that.

IVB_CFM_49.speaker: Karlach
IVB_CFM_49.text: Look, whatever else it may be, the tadpole isn't a liar. I never wanted to serve Zariel, and I escaped the first chance I could. So stand down.
IVB_CFM_49.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gears herself up for battleNodeContext: Ready for a fight if needed.

IVB_CFM_34.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_34.text: Let's take things down a notch, shall we? She's no devil, Wyll. You'll have to look elsewhere to find fodder for your blade.

IVB_CFM_25.speaker: Wyll
IVB_CFM_25.text: How can I make peace with the monster I was sent to kill?

IVB_CFM_92.speaker: Karlach
IVB_CFM_92.text: You know monsters, right? Better than anyone. Look into my eyes. Can't you see I'm not what you think?

IVB_CFM_30.speaker: Narrator
IVB_CFM_30.text: *Two souls hang in the balance. Kill Karlach, fulfil your contract - and condemn a possible innocent to the Hells. Or spare her and face the repercussions with Mizora.*

IVB_CFM_54.speaker: Wyll
IVB_CFM_54.text: Dammit. This is an unwelcome complication.

IVB_CFM_42.speaker: Wyll
IVB_CFM_42.text: It will mean my undoing, but... I believe you.

IVB_CFM_14.speaker: Karlach
IVB_CFM_14.text: Thank the gods, he sees sense! Look, Blade - Wyll - I know you love bashing evil - we have that in common.

IVB_CFM_0.speaker: Karlach
IVB_CFM_0.text: Friends? I've gathered quite the collection.

IVB_CFM_80.speaker: Karlach
IVB_CFM_80.text: Well met. Now let's kick some arse while there's still arse to be kicked.

IVB_CFM_5.speaker: Wyll
IVB_CFM_5.text: Let's start at allies and work from there.

IVB_CFM_82.speaker: Karlach
IVB_CFM_82.text: I can live with that. Besides, I enjoy winning hard cases over.

IVB_CFM_45.speaker: Karlach
IVB_CFM_45.text: Touchy, touchy. But hey, I spent a decade in Avernus surrounded by imps and devils. Winning you over will be child's play.

IVB_CFM_87.speaker: Wyll
IVB_CFM_87.text: Save your breath. Let's see if this devil bleeds.

IVB_CFM_85.speaker: Karlach
IVB_CFM_85.text: You know, I could've used a few friends. Pity that won't be any of you.

IVB_CFM_89.speaker: Wyll
IVB_CFM_89.text: I'm sorry, Karlach. There's too much at stake.

IVB_CFM_104.speaker: Wyll
IVB_CFM_104.text: You don't know what this means. You don't know what you're asking me to do.

IVB_CFM_69.speaker: Karlach
IVB_CFM_69.text: I'm asking you to live, Wyll. I don't want to hurt you. And, to be frank, I'd rather not find out how the Blade got his name.

IVB_CFM_105.speaker: Karlach
IVB_CFM_105.text: I swear to you, on all I am, I'm not what you think.

IVB_CFM_102.speaker: Wyll
IVB_CFM_102.text: No. No second-guessing. The devil dies - now.

IVB_CFM_13.speaker: Karlach
IVB_CFM_13.text: Too bad. I thought maybe you could be a friend. I could've done with one of those.

IVB_CFM_65.speaker: Gale
IVB_CFM_65.text: Easy, Wyll. She's no devil. There's no fight to be had here.

IVB_CFM_72.speaker: Astarion
IVB_CFM_72.text: Now, now, children - let's not lose our heads. Figuratively or literally.
IVB_CFM_72.context: NodeContext: Wyll and Karlach are ready to fight and kill each other. Astarion speaks up to try and stop them

IVB_CFM_52.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_52.text: Control yourself, Wyll. I understand bloodthirst. But this is no time to quench it.

IVB_CFM_9.speaker: Wyll
IVB_CFM_9.text: I've hunted you to the Hells and beyond. It ends here, Karlach.

IVB_CFM_79.speaker: Karlach
IVB_CFM_79.text: For fuck's sake, you must be half troll to have a skull that thick.

IVB_CFM_76.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_76.text: You two have met before, I take it?

IVB_CFM_90.speaker: Gale
IVB_CFM_90.text: You two have met before, I take it?
